text: @WhiteHouse @PressSec Wait a minute...all I keep hearing is that "Just because you've had Covid19 doesn't mean you can't get it again. The immune system protections wear off fast and the antibodies are gone in a matter of a few short weeks or months". So doesn't that mean a vaccine can't work?!?
